00041 #include "pizNeuralGas.h"

00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00046 #include <stdlib.h>
00047 #include <math.h>   
00048 #include <time.h>

00050 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 
00053 #define PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE               128
00054 #define PIZ_MAXIMUM_VECTOR_SIZE         256
00055 
00056 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_VECTOR_SIZE         4
00057 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_SIZE        20
00058 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_LAMBDA              2
00059 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_ALPHA               0.5
00060 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_BETA                0.1
00061 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_EPSILON1            0.5
00062 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_EPSILON2            0.25
00063 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_KAPPA               10.
00064 
00065 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 
00068 PIZNeuralGas *pizNeuralGasNew (long argc, long *argv)
00069 {
00070     PIZNeuralGas *x = NULL;
00071 
00072     if (x = (PIZNeuralGas *)malloc (sizeof(PIZNeuralGas)))
00073         {
00074             long err = PIZ_GOOD;
00075             
00076             if (x->headStock = (PIZNeuralGasHead *)malloc (PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE * sizeof(PIZNeuralGasHead))) {
00077                 long k, i;
00078                 
00079                 x->count        = 0;
00080                 x->vectorSize   = PIZ_DEFAULT_VECTOR_SIZE;
00081                 x->maximumSize  = PIZ_DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_SIZE;
00082                 
00083                 x->lambda       = PIZ_DEFAULT_LAMBDA;
00084                 x->epsilon1     = PIZ_DEFAULT_EPSILON1;
00085                 x->epsilon2     = PIZ_DEFAULT_EPSILON2;
00086                 x->alpha        = PIZ_DEFAULT_ALPHA;
00087                 x->beta         = PIZ_DEFAULT_BETA;
00088                 x->kappa        = PIZ_DEFAULT_KAPPA;
00089                 
00090                 srand ((unsigned int)time(NULL));
00091                 
00092                 if (argc && ((argv[0] > 1)  && (argv[0] <= PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE))) {
00093                         x->maximumSize = argv[0];
00094                     }
00095                 
00096                 if ((argc > 1) && ((argv[1] > 0)  && (argv[1] <= PIZ_MAXIMUM_VECTOR_SIZE))) {
00097                         x->vectorSize = argv[1];
00098                     }
00099                 
00100                 k = PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE * x->vectorSize;
00101                 
00102                 if (!(x->vectorStock = (double *)malloc (k * sizeof(double)))) {
00103                         err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00104                     }
00105                     
00106                 if (x->ticketMachine = pizBoundedStackNew (PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE)) {
00107                     for (i = (PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE - 1); i > 1; i--) {
00108                             pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, i);
00109                         }
00110                 } else {
00111                     err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00112                 }
00113                 
00114                 if (!err) {
00115                     for (i = 0; i < (x->vectorSize * 2); i++) {
00116                             x->vectorStock[i] = PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE * (rand ( ) / (RAND_MAX + 1.0));
00117                         }
00118                     
00119                     x->headStock[0].error   = 0.;
00120                     x->headStock[0].utility = 1.;
00121                     x->headStock[1].error   = 0.;
00122                     x->headStock[1].utility = 1.;
00123                     
00124                     pizItemset128Clear (&x->headStock[0].arcs);
00125                     pizItemset128Clear (&x->headStock[1].arcs);
00126                     
00127                     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->headStock[0].arcs, 1);
00128                     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->headStock[1].arcs, 0);
00129                     
00130                     pizItemset128Clear (&x->map);
00131                     
00132                     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->map, 0);
00133                     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->map, 1);
00134                     
00135                     x->mapSize = 2;
00136                 } else {
00137                     pizNeuralGasFree (x);
00138                     x = NULL;
00139                 }
00140             } else {
00141                 free (x);
00142                 x = NULL;
00143             }
00144         }
00145     
00146     return x;
00147 }
00148 
00149 void pizNeuralGasFree (PIZNeuralGas *x)
00150 {
00151     if (x) {
00152         pizBoundedStackFree (x->ticketMachine);
00153         x->ticketMachine = NULL;
00154         
00155         free (x->headStock);
00156         x->headStock = NULL;
00157         
00158         if (x->vectorStock) {
00159                 free (x->vectorStock);
00160                 x->vectorStock = NULL;
00161             }
00162         
00163         free (x);
00164     }
00165 }

00169 
00170 PIZError pizNeuralGasAdd (PIZNeuralGas *x, long argc, long *argv)
00171 {
00172     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00173     
00174     if (argc && argv) {
00175     
00176         long t;
00177         long k = (argc / x->vectorSize);
00178         
00179         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00180         
00181         for (t = 0; t < argc; t++) {
00182                 argv[t] = CLAMP (argv[t], 0, PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE - 1); 
00183             }
00184                     
00185         for (t = 0; t < k; t++) {   
00186             long            i, j;
00187             long            winner1             = -1;
00188             long            winner2             = -1;
00189             double          dist1               = 0.;
00190             double          dist2               = 0.;
00191             
00192             for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; i++) {
00193             
00194                 double e = 0.;
00195                 
00196                 if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&x->map, i)) {
00197                 
00198                     for (j = 0; j < x->vectorSize; j++) {
00199                     e += pow (x->vectorStock[(i * x->vectorSize) + j] - argv[(t * x->vectorSize) + j], 2);
00200                     }
00201                     
00202                     if ((e < dist1) || (winner1 == -1)) {
00203                         dist2   = dist1;
00204                         winner2 = winner1;
00205                         dist1   = e;
00206                         winner1 = i;
00207                     } else if ((e < dist2) || (winner2 == -1)) {
00208                         dist2   = e;
00209                         winner2 = i;
00210                     }
00211                 }
00212             }
00213 
00214             x->headStock[winner1].error     += dist1;
00215             x->headStock[winner1].utility   += (dist2 - dist1);
00216             
00217             for (i = 0; i < x->vectorSize; i++) {
00218                 x->vectorStock[(winner1 * x->vectorSize) + i] += x->epsilon1 
00219                     * (argv[(t * x->vectorSize) + i] - x->vectorStock[(winner1 * x->vectorSize) + i]);
00220             }
00221             
00222             for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; i++) {
00223                 if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&x->headStock[winner1].arcs, i)) {
00224                     for (j = 0; j < x->vectorSize; j++) {
00225                         x->vectorStock[(i * x->vectorSize) + j] += x->epsilon2 * 
00226                             (argv[(t * x->vectorSize) + j] - x->vectorStock[(i * x->vectorSize) + j]);
00227                     }
00228                 }
00229             }
00230             
00231             if (!(x->count % x->lambda)) {
00232                 long    maxError1 = -1;
00233                 long    maxError2 = -1;
00234                 long    minUtility = -1;
00235                 double  maxError1Value = 0.;
00236                 double  maxError2Value = 0.;
00237                 double  minUtilityValue = 0.;
00238                 
00239                 for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; i++) {
00240                     if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&x->map, i)) {
00241                         if ((x->headStock[i].error > maxError1Value) || (maxError1 == -1)) {
00242                                 maxError1       = i;
00243                                 maxError1Value  = x->headStock[i].error;
00244                             }   
00245                         
00246                         if ((x->headStock[i].utility < minUtilityValue) || (minUtility == -1)) {
00247                                 minUtility      = i;
00248                                 minUtilityValue = x->headStock[i].utility;
00249                             }
00250                         }
00251                     }
00252                 
00253                 for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; i++) {
00254                     if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&x->headStock[maxError1].arcs, i)) {
00255                             if ((x->headStock[i].error > maxError2Value) || (maxError2 == -1)) {
00256                                     maxError2       = i;
00257                                     maxError2Value  = x->headStock[i].error;
00258                                 }
00259                         }
00260                     }
00261                 
00262                 if ((x->mapSize < x->maximumSize) && !(pizBoundedStackPop (x->ticketMachine))) {
00263                     long p = pizBoundedStackPoppedValue (x->ticketMachine);
00264                     
00265                     pizItemset128Clear (&x->headStock[p].arcs);
00266 
00267                     for (i = 0; i < x->vectorSize; i++) {
00268                     x->vectorStock[(p * x->vectorSize) + i] = (x->vectorStock[(maxError1 * x->vectorSize) 
00269                         + i] + x->vectorStock[(maxError2 * x->vectorSize) + i]) / 2.;
00270                     }
00271 
00272                     pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (&x->headStock[maxError1].arcs, maxError2);
00273                     pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (&x->headStock[maxError2].arcs, maxError1);
00274                     
00275                     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->headStock[maxError1].arcs, p);
00276                     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->headStock[maxError2].arcs, p);
00277                     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->headStock[p].arcs, maxError1);
00278                     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->headStock[p].arcs, maxError2);
00279                     
00280                     x->headStock[maxError1].error = x->alpha * x->headStock[maxError1].error;
00281                     x->headStock[maxError2].error = x->alpha * x->headStock[maxError2].error;
00282                     
00283                     x->headStock[p].error = (x->headStock[maxError1].error 
00284                         + x->headStock[maxError2].error) / 2.;
00285                                                 
00286                     x->headStock[p].utility = (x->headStock[maxError1].utility 
00287                         + x->headStock[maxError2].utility) / 2.;
00288                     
00289                     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->map, p);
00290                     
00291                     x->mapSize ++;
00292                 }
00293                 
00294                 if ((maxError1Value / minUtilityValue) > x->kappa) {
00295                     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; i++) {
00296                         if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&x->headStock[minUtility].arcs, i)) {
00297                             pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (&x->headStock[i].arcs, minUtility);
00298                         }
00299                     }
00300                     
00301                     pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (&x->map, minUtility);
00302                     x->mapSize --;
00303                     pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, minUtility);
00304                 }
00305                 
00306                 for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; i++) {
00307                     if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&x->map, i)) {
00308                         if (!pizItemset128Count (&x->headStock[i].arcs)) {
00309                                 pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (&x->map, i);
00310                                 x->mapSize --;
00311                                 pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, i);
00312                             }
00313                         }
00314                     }
00315             }
00316             
00317             for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; i++) {
00318                 if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&x->map, i)) {
00319                         x->headStock[i].error   -= x->beta * x->headStock[i].error;
00320                         x->headStock[i].utility -= x->beta * x->headStock[i].utility;
00321                     }
00322             }
00323             
00324             if (!x->mapSize) {
00325                 pizNeuralGasClear (x);
00326             } else {
00327                 x->count ++;
00328             }
00329         }
00330     }
00331         
00332     return err;
00333 }
00334 
00335 void pizNeuralGasClear (PIZNeuralGas *x)
00336 {
00337     long i;
00338     
00339     x->count = 0;
00340     
00341     for (i = 0; i < (x->vectorSize * 2); i++) {
00342             x->vectorStock[i] = PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE * (rand ( ) / (RAND_MAX + 1.0));
00343         }
00344     
00345     x->headStock[0].error   = 0.;
00346     x->headStock[0].utility = 1.;
00347     x->headStock[1].error   = 0.;
00348     x->headStock[1].utility = 1.;
00349     
00350     pizItemset128Clear (&x->headStock[0].arcs);
00351     pizItemset128Clear (&x->headStock[1].arcs);
00352     
00353     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->headStock[0].arcs, 1);
00354     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->headStock[1].arcs, 0);
00355     
00356     pizItemset128Clear (&x->map);
00357     
00358     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->map, 0);
00359     pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&x->map, 1);
00360     
00361     pizBoundedStackClear (x->ticketMachine);
00362     
00363     for (i = (PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE - 1); i > 1; i--) {
00364             pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, i);
00365         }
00366     
00367     x->mapSize = 2;
00368 }
00369 
00370 PIZError pizNeuralGasProceed (const PIZNeuralGas *x, long argc, long *argv)
00371 {
00372     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00373     
00374     if (argc && argv) {
00375     
00376         long    i;
00377         double  *temp = NULL;
00378         
00379         for (i = 0; i < argc; i++) {
00380             if ((i % x->vectorSize) == 0) {
00381             
00382                 long j;
00383                 long p = -1;
00384                 long h = (long)(x->mapSize * (rand ( ) / (RAND_MAX + 1.0)));
00385                 
00386                 for (j = 0; j < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; j++) {
00387                     if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&x->map, j)) {
00388                         if (!h) {
00389                                 p = j;
00390                                 break;
00391                             }
00392                         
00393                         h --;
00394                     }
00395                 }
00396                 
00397                 temp = x->vectorStock + (p * x->vectorSize);
00398             }
00399             
00400             argv[i] = (long)(*(temp + (i % x->vectorSize)) + 0.5);
00401         }
00402         
00403         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00404     }
00405     
00406     return err;
00407 }
00408 
00409 long pizNeuralGasCount (const PIZNeuralGas *x)
00410 {
00411     return x->count;
00412 }
